mapper.select: select * from customer order by CUS_NUM desc
mapper.insert: insert into customer(CUS_ID, CUS_PWD, CUS_NAME, CUS_GENDER, CUS_EMAIL, CUS_ADDR, CUS_TEL, CUS_BIRTH, CUS_DELIV_ADDR) values(#{CUS_ID}, #{CUS_PWD}, #{CUS_NAME}, #{CUS_GENDER}, #{CUS_EMAIL}, #{CUS_ADDR}, #{CUS_TEL}, #{CUS_BIRTH}, #{CUS_DELIV_ADDR});
mapper.update: update customer set CUS_ID=#{CUS_ID}, CUS_PWD=#{CUS_PWD}, CUS_NAME=#{CUS_NAME}, CUS_GENDER=#{CUS_GENDER}, CUS_EMAIL=#{CUS_EMAIL}, CUS_ADDR=#{CUS_ADDR}, CUS_TEL=#{CUS_TEL}, CUS_BIRTH=#{CUS_BIRTH}, CUS_DELIV_ADDR=#{CUS_DELIV_ADDR}, CUS_POINT=#{CUS_POINT} where CUS_NUM=#{CUS_NUM}
